name: deployb2cpolicies
description: Allows Trust Framework Policy XML files to be deployed to a B2C tenant.
author: DarkLoop

inputs.label: Azure AD B2C Connection
inputs.name: b2cTenantConnection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Connection to the Azure AD B2C Tenant. [How to setup your service connection](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=darkloop.b2c-tasks#create-a-connection-to-your-b2c-tenant).

inputs.label: Root Directory
inputs.name: rootFolder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The root directory to look for specified policies

inputs.label: Policies
inputs.name: policies
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma or line separated paths to the policies to upload. When specifying a folder, all XML files contained in it will be uploaded.

inputs.label: Skip if exists
inputs.name: ignoreIfExist
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma or line separated policy IDs that should be ignored if the policy already exists in the target B2C tenant. The prefix `B2C_1A_` can be ommited.
